bike.description: High Modulus C-4 carbon w/RIB Tech, Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Integrated Aero seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L (56cm), XL (58cm), XXL (60cm)

components.description: High Modulus C-4 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged Aluminum drop out w/replaceable hanger
FC-440 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech, Tapered Carbon steerer & carbon drop out
FSA AL-86 Press In Bearing System
Oval W-524 Alloy Clincher Wheelset, 24mm rim-700c, Sealed bearings
Vittoria Zaffiro II, 700x23c, Black Wire Bead
Oval RB-300 forged alloy dual pivot
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U- 1 1/2"L Integrated, w/Carbon convex topcap
Oval SR-500 Flat w/ CrMo Rails
C-4 Aero Carbon w/ Ritchey Clamp System
